questions.question: Hoe laat en waar het die ongeluk plaasgevind?
Waarheen is die beseerdes en oorledenes geneem? (Watter hospitaal of lykshuis)
Was daar enige helde- of reddingsdade?
Was daar enige arrestasies of ander regsoptrede?
Wat is die skade aan die voertuie?
Hoe vinning het die betrokke voertuie gery?
Waarheen is hulle vandaan of op pad?
Was daar enige vreemde weers- of padtoestande wat kon gelei het tot die ongeluk?
Wat het volgens ooggetuies, ondersoekbeamptes en mense wat betrokke was by die voorval, gebeur?
Wat is die begrafnisreÃ«lings?
Is enige persone beseer of dood? Indien wel, hoeveel?
Watter soort voertuie was betrokke?
Wat is die besonderhede van die betrokke bestuurders?
questions.description: Name, ouderdomme, adresse, ander persoonlike inligting.

questions.question: Wat was die oorsaak van die ongeluk?
questions.description: (volgens paramedici, die polisie of ander amptelike bronne)

questions.question: Wat is die besonderhede van enige ander betrokkenes?
Wat is die identiteit van die beseerdes en oorledenes?
Wat is die omvang van die beserings?
Wat is die toestand van die beseerdes?
Additional info/notes
Contact details of people you've interviewed
What time did the accident happen and where?
Where were the injured and dead taken?
Were there any acts of bravery or any rescues?
Were there any arrests or other legal action?
What is the damage to the vehicles?
What was the speed of vehicles involved?
Where were they coming from/going to?
Were there any strange weather or road conditions that could have caused the accident?
What happened according to eyewitnesses, investigating officers and people involved in incident?
What are the funeral arrangements for the dead?
Were any people injured or dead and how many?
What type of vehicles were involved?
What is the identification of the drivers involved?
questions.description: Names, ages, addresses, other personal information.

questions.question: What was the cause of the accident?
questions.description: (according to paramedics, police or other official sources)

questions.question: What is the identification of any others involved?
What is the identification of the injured and dead?
What is the extent of any injuries?
What is the condition of the injured?
